ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectLorna Shoyama Tax Remission Order
PrecisINDIVIDUAL REMISSION ORDER remits tax paid or payable by LORNA SHOYAMA under Part I of the Income Tax Act in the amounts of $10,871.03, $7,286.43, $14,721.30, $8,006.70, $9,092.10, $3,044.24, $4,219.01, $3,602.73, $3,493.22, $2,988.31, and $1,744.72 for the 1980 to 1984 and 1986 to 1991 taxation years, respectively, and all relevant interest on that tax.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2011-0063 Publication Date: 2011-08-17
AttachmentsAttachment
